tool_description: Generates personalized item recommendations based on wishlist items, user preferences, and trending products to enhance the wishlist experience.

include_similar_items.description: Include items similar to current wishlist items

include_complementary.description: Include items that complement wishlist items

error_messages: Invalid recommendation count: Count must be between 1 and 20.
Invalid price range: Maximum price must be greater than minimum price.
No recommendations available: Unable to generate recommendations based on current criteria.
Empty wishlist: User must have items in wishlist for personalized recommendations.
usage: Provide user_id to generate recommendations. Customize the number of recommendations, types of suggestions, price range, and category exclusions to fine-tune results.

recommendation_reasons.description: Array of reasons why each item was recommended

confidence_scores.description: Array of confidence scores for each recommendation (0-1)
